Room.Name: Oceancrest Mountaineer's Supply
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Oceancrest Mountaineer's Equipment and Supply store.
Room.LongDescription: The store provides various supplies to mountain climbers, from the simple to the exotic. If you need a specialized piece of gear, you will probably find it here. A new section of the store is devoted to spelunkers as a number of caves have been discovered within the city walls.
